title: syama kalEbara
sahitya:
shyAma kalEbara rAma sahOdara mAmava shrI guruvAyupurEshvara

anupallavi

 sAmaga kIrtita bhUri yashObhara bhIma parAkrama vAmA mnOhara

caraNam

 nitya sukhaprada krSNa dAmOdara nirdhUta pApa nikara nirantara 
satyabhAmA vara satva guNAdhAra saccinmaya vana tulasIdalahAra
